1.0.name: wordpress/ml-post-slider
1.0.description:
ML Post Slider is a widget designed to display your slides in any widget area.

DEMO

You have to create special slider category which contains all slides which you want display in slideshow. Plugin use standard post editor to create slide. Widget have simple and short configuration. It use JQuery and Cycle plugin. This provides stable and professional working in any kind of web browser. More info in home page of plugin (click!).
